Our meetings are held for about 90 minutes every other Sunday in our IRC channel, #ubuntu-us-ca on <nowiki>[[https://libera.chat|libera.chat]]</nowiki>. See <nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-ContactUs|our contact page]]</nowiki> for more information and connection instructions. All interested people are welcome to join us. We <nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-MeetingChecklist|announce]]</nowiki> the meetings in several ways.  See the meeting pages below for IRC logs.

'''Start time''': 7:00pm (19:00) PT

For help connecting, check out the InternetRelayChat page or use the <nowiki>[[https://web.libera.chat/?channels=#ubuntu-us-ca|Javascript webchat client]]</nowiki>.

Following the meeting a volunteer will follow the <nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-MeetingChecklist|MeetingChecklist]]</nowiki> to make sure meetings are properly archived.
